objects.query: SELECT Id, Name, OrderApi__Catalog__c, OrderApi__Description__c, OrderApi__Display_Order__c, OrderApi__Enable_Access_Permissions__c, OrderApi__Is_Published__c, OrderApi__Store__c, OrderApi__Catalog_Filters__c, OrderApi__Display_Featured_Items__c, OrderApi__Placeholder_Image__c FROM OrderApi__Catalog__c
SELECT Id, Name, OrderApi__Catalog__c, OrderApi__Is_Featured__c, OrderApi__Is_Published__c, OrderApi__Item__c FROM OrderApi__Catalog_Item__c
